text: The Halifax Mooseheads are a Canadian ice hockey team. They began playing in 1994. The team currently plays in the Quebec Major Junior Hockey League (QMJHL). They play their home games in Halifax, Nova Scotia at the Halifax Metro Centre. ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Canadian Hockey League teams Category:Halifax, Nova Scotia Category:Ice hockey teams in Canada Category:Quebec Major Junior Hockey League Category:1994 establishments in Canada Category:Organizations based in Nova Scotia
title: Halifax Mooseheads
